variables-naming-rules_key3: In `Python` for naming `variables` ,some rules are followed. If we do not follow  these rules then the *program* is not going to be correct.
variables-naming-rules_key4: Keep these 3 rules always in your mind:
variables-naming-rules_key5: Name starts with either a - Letter or  an _ (underscore).
variables-naming-rules_key6: Only letters, underscore or numbers can be present in the Name( no special characters).
variables-naming-rules_key7: It is Case Sensitive (means varx, varX, Varx are different `variables`).
variables-naming-rules_key9: **Activity: In `Python` shell,try to put values  in the Incorrect `variable` names. See how `python` gives errors.**
